content: Hold on, the route plan is almost ready. Oh, it's you, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>. Sorry about that. <style=SizeSmall>Thought it was the archaeological team checking up on me again...</style>
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: {A拍手}Welcome! I'm Mobai, the coordinator here. If you need help with anything in your everyday life, just come to me.
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: No wonder it sounds so lively over there. Let me get ready, and I'll be right there. See you at the camp, kwa heri!
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: I'm <style=NpcName>Msafiri</style>, I specialize in exploring unknown planets and often help archaeological teams plan routes and lead their expeditions.
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: {A得意}If you ever want to visit or learn about a new place, just ask me. With my guidebook in hand, I know every sight and land!, kula bata!
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: I hope we get along well.
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里
NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: The place is ready. Time to give <style=NpcName>Msafiri</style> a call and invite him to move in!
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: Hoho~, thank you all for your warm welcomes. Wishing our new friend a smooth and joyful life here. Now then, today's welcome party has come to a wonderful end!
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: Your accommodation is ready, I'll be waiting for you!
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: {A虎啸}Haaah! <style=SizeBig>Hello everyone!</style> Ahem, sorry, got a little carried away.
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: Now, let's welcome <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, the owner of this Planet, to say a few words!
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: Msa-fi-ri! Mmph, that name sounds so familiar. {A拍手}Anyway, looking forward to working with you!
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: Everything's ready. Welcome to your new home!
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里
